questions.question: What are your daily habits? What time do you get up, etc.?

answers.answer: everyday i get up at 8 a clock. I always turn my music on. To have a nice day. Firstly, i take my shower. In a second time I breakfast. Then i go to school. But that's depend about my timetable. I don't begin at 8h30 everday so sometimes I watch tv
